about_the_game:
A sick man entrusts an innovative technology company promising a cure. In exchange, he agrees to entrust them solely with his body and memories. Upon awakening, a simulation begins to safely awaken his brain, but during the awakening process, he remembers a life he has never lived.

The game is a first-person puzzle game developed using Unreal Engine 5.2.

MAIN MECHANIC:

Dual Hemisphere: Experience puzzles simultaneously in two realms, where your actions in the primary memories influence your host, but not the other way around. Remember! :)

MAIN FEATURES:

60 LEVELS + CHALLENGES!

Game modes include:

Single Player (Story Mode)
Local Multiplayer (Co-op with friends over Wi-Fi) - Currently unavailable
Challenges (For those seeking the highest difficulty) - Currently unavailable
Extras (The Challenge of Master Enzo Sorrentino)
On average, gameplay lasts 8 hours, although some players have enjoyed up to 14 hours.

The game's graphics evolve from initially low details to a richer experience as the protagonist regains access to his memories.

Remember, it's still in Early Access. If you'd like the game to be more challenging or easier, please let me know! Your feedback is precious. ❤️
